overview:
Rory joined Payzone in 2004 as Chief Information Officer. Prior to joining Payzone, Rory spent 3 years as Director of Engineering with Spectel (Avaya). Before this, he spent 7 years in Switzerland as EMEA Director of Operations with Autodesk Inc. Prior to working with Autodesk Inc., Rory held a number of senior managerial positions across Ireland and the USA with Motorola and Borland Software Corporation. Before this, he worked as Engineering Manager with Lotus in Ireland for 2 years. He has over 18 year’s experience working with multinational and Irish companies across the globe.

Rory holds an MBA from Open Business School in London, an MSc in e-Commerce from Dublin City University and a Bachelor’s Degree in engineering from Dublin Institute of Technology.
